name: Music_3139.wav
keywords: ['meditation', 'relaxing', 'synth pads/drones', 'flute sound', 'digital female choir pad', 'piano', 'reverb', 'slow tempo']
caption: This song contains a lot of synth pad and drone sounds creating a meditative atmosphere. Then a deep soft bass sound comes in. A piano is playing a slow melody with a lot of reverb. A flute sound is playing a simple melody on top and a pluck instrument is playing another short melody. Then a digital female choir sounding pad comes in. This song may be playing during a meditation session.
